item.title: Things Are Not Going How I Thought
item.description: Everything was supposed to be easy, but it wasn't. This video captures the moment things went wrong and the troubleshooting required to get the job back on track.

media:content.media:title: Things Are Not Going How I Thought
media:content.media:description: Everything was supposed to be easy, but it wasn't. This video captures the moment things went wrong and the troubleshooting required to get the job back on track.

item.title: Why Not Start A Building Project During Harvest!?!
item.description: What happens when a major building project starts at the same time as the busiest season of the year? This video documents the added challenge and the hard work required to keep both projects moving forward.

item.title: 1970s Shed Has Seen Better Days Time To Fix!!
item.description: Work smarter, not harder! ðŸ’¡ **Description:** Discover clever lifehacks that make everyday tasks faster and easier. Small tricks, big results!

item.title: Spraying Between The Rain Clouds! Should This Work?
item.description: What happens when you spray between the rain clouds? This video documents our risky race against the weather, showing the challenging conditions and the critical timing required to get the job done before the downpour hits.

item.title: 36 Rows Of The Wrong Product!
item.description: What happens when a big mistake happens during planting? This video documents the costly error of putting down 36 rows of the wrong product and the urgent steps we had to take to fix the problem.

item.title: Who Will Win?! Self Propelled Sprayer Vs. Pull Type Sprayer
item.description: What happens when two different sprayers go head-to-head? This video compares a self-propelled sprayer against a pull-type sprayer, breaking down the pros, cons, and performance of each machine in the field.

item.title: Working The Last Field To End In A Downpour!
item.description: What happens when the last job is hit by a sudden rainstorm? This video documents our race against the weather to finish the final field before the downpour makes the work impossible.

item.title: The Mud Is Destroying Our Combines!
item.description: What happens when heavy mud threatens the harvest? This video documents the damaging reality of working in wet fields, showing the costly toll the mud is taking on our combines and machinery.

item.title: This Is The End Of Them!
item.description: It was a long fight, but we finally finished it.

item.title: It All Goes Good Till It Doesnâ€™t! We Arenâ€™t Stuck Yet!
item.description: What happens when you tempt fate on the job? This video documents a challenging moment when the project took an unexpected turn, proving that success often hangs by a thread.

item.title: Dougo Upgraded The Lake House!
item.description: What did Dougo do to the lake house? This video documents the full renovation and upgrade, showing the awesome results of the big project and all the work that went into it.

item.title: This Could Have Ended Badly!
item.description: Go inside a moment when a routine job almost became a disaster. We'll show you the unexpected problem and the critical steps we took to get through a very dangerous situation.

item.title: Disaster on the Farm! Steering Wheel Snaps
item.description: A simple job became an emergency! This video documents the shocking moment our steering wheel snapped mid-job and the urgent, challenging repair required to keep the farm running

item.title: A Chain of Issues! This Is Why We Donâ€™t Plow Anymore
item.description: Go inside a challenging day in the field. We'll show you the major equipment breakdowns and the cascading problems that explain exactly why we decided to change our farming methods forever.

item.title: We Have Been Humbled! Lesson Learned!
item.description: What happens when a project humbles you? This video documents a major setback that taught us a valuable, unforgettable lesson. Weâ€™ll share the entire story and the wisdom we gained from the experience.

item.title: The Soybean Aphids Are Out Of Control!
item.description: What happens when soybean aphids get out of control? This video is a first-hand look at a critical situation, detailing the necessary steps for pest management and saving the harvest.

item.title: Working The Last Field To End In A Downpour!
item.description: What happens when the last job is hit by a sudden rainstorm? This video documents our race against the weather to finish the final field before the downpour makes the work impossible.

item.title: Itâ€™s Seen Better Days!!
item.description: The job is big, but we can do it.

item.title: This Is Going To Be A Disaster! Killing Beans!
item.description: What happens when a necessary job feels like a disaster? Weâ€™ll show you the full process of killing the bean plants and explain why this critical step is essential for a smooth and successful harvest.

item.title: The Gophers Are Destroying Our Tile System!!
item.description: What happens when gophers compromise your farm's drainage? This video documents the frustrating damage to our tile system and the urgent, costly repairs needed to prevent massive water damage.
